hymns.title: Heavenly Glory
hymns.author: Grace Thompson
hymns.lyrics:
Heavenly glory, divine light,
Guiding us through the darkest night.
In Your presence, we find our rest,
With You, we are forever blessed. eavenly glory, divine light,

hymns.title: Eternal Praise
hymns.author: Michael Johnson
hymns.lyrics:
Eternal praise to our God above,
Whose grace and mercy abound in love.
In every trial, His hand we see,
Guiding us to eternity.

hymns.title: Savior's Embrace
hymns.author: Sarah Clark
hymns.lyrics:
In the Savior's embrace, we find peace,
His love for us will never cease.
Through every storm, He holds us tight,
Guiding us with His holy light.

hymns.title: Sacred Whispers
hymns.author: Jonathan Davis
hymns.lyrics:
Sacred whispers, in the breeze,
Bring us to our knees.
In quiet moments, we hear Your voice,
In Your presence, we rejoice.

hymns.title: Grace Abounds
hymns.author: Emily Roberts
hymns.lyrics:
Grace abounds in endless streams,
Filling our hearts with heavenly dreams.
In every trial, His love is near,
Wiping away every tear.

hymns.title: Morning's Light
hymns.author: Jacob Wilson
hymns.lyrics:
In the morning's light, we see Your face,
Filled with mercy, full of grace.
Guide our steps throughout the day,
In Your love, we'll always stay.

hymns.title: Redeeming Love
hymns.author: Emma Baker
hymns.lyrics:
Redeeming love, how sweet the sound,
Lifting us from the depths profound.
In Christ alone, our hope is found,
In His love, we're forever bound.

hymns.title: Heaven's Choir
hymns.author: Matthew Adams
hymns.lyrics:
Heaven's choir sings in perfect harmony,
Proclaiming God's eternal majesty.
Joining in their joyful song,
Praising Him our whole life long.

hymns.title: Guiding Light
hymns.author: Olivia Foster
hymns.lyrics:
Guiding light, shine bright and clear,
Dispelling darkness, calming fear.
In Your presence, we find our way,
Leading us to eternal day.

hymns.title: Faithful Friend
hymns.author: Lucas Evans
hymns.lyrics:
Faithful friend, in times of need,
Your love for us, an endless creed.
In every trial, You're by our side,
In Your love, we will abide.

hymns.title: Faithful Friend
hymns.author: Lucas Evans
hymns.lyrics:
Faithful friend, in times of need,
Your love for us, an endless creed.
In every trial, You're by our side,
In Your love, we will abide.
